title: Credit Score Competition Act of 2017
content: Credit Score Competition Act of 2017 This bill amends the Federal National Mortgage Association Charter Actnbsp, and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation Actnbsp, to allownbsp. The Federal National Mortgage Association and the Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corporation , whennbsp, determining whether to purchase a residential mortgage,nbsp. To consider a borrower's credit score only if certain procedural requirementsnbsp. Are met with respect to the validation and approval of credit-scoring models. The Federal Housing Finance Agency may, by regulation, establish standards and criteria for processes used by Fannie Mae and Freddie Macnbsp, to validate and approve credit-scoring models in accordance withnbsp, the bill.
